AFC Cup Reception Event
1  February,  2024
In partnership with the Local Organizing Committee of the AFC Cup, Best Buddies Qatar received the Asian Cup to promote social sports inclusion for persons with disabilities and their partners. The event saw the participation of 200 members from Best Buddies Qatar clubs, including boys and girls from government middle and high schools, private schools, disability centers, and the Citizen Program.
During the event, participants took commemorative photos with the mascot of the 18th tournament, which was designed as a Gerbil family.
